Articles.Content:
Gets a pile of crushed chitin.

Inserts bundle of clipped fuel tanks.

Gets Kracken.

Inserts small children.

Gets arrested. (Actually, that applies perfectly to most situations here, doesn't it?)

Inserts *cooked* locust.

Releases the 8th Plague of Eygpt.

Inserts BGM-109 'Tomahawk' Nuclear missile warhead. (no reason >:)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-10T16:10:19Z" title="05/10/2016 04:10  PM" data-short="8 yr">May 10, 2016</time> by TheSealBrigade**

Gets muted "phut" noise.

inserts grey goo

Gets grey goo that eats the entire universe ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Inserts a Resonance Cascade.

Gets resonating wave machine (the kind in water parks).

Inserts A Square.

You get a mind-bending dimensional paradox.

Inserts KSP forums

Hears Max\_Creative and Galacticvoyager arguing about Dres inside the vending machine.

Inserts several live locusts. (I got curious, ok?)

Gets a giant swarm of bugs in your face. 

Inserts the krakenists/Dres followers thing... 

(And plz don't say "gets [@Galacticvoyager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/155981-galacticvoyager/).")

Gets "Dres" and the Kracken in an epic battle of fates

Inserts tiger shark

Gets a cute little catfish.

Inserts a pony...

Gets the roughly severed horn of a unicorn.

Inserts toaster.

Gets a rip in the Time-Space continuum.

Inserts Grandfather Paradox

Gets two identical grandfathers.

Inserts bucket of snails.

Gets disgruntled Frenchman.

Inserts Analytical Engine.

Gets Aryan Empire.

Inserts #2 pencil.

Gets a typewriter.

Inserts a Rubix Cube

Gets Rubik's cube with a sticky note complaining about your spelling. It's not written on the sticky note, the note itself is grumbling to itself.

Inserts disgruntled sticky note.

Gets an odd, sticky substance...

Inserts an Orca

Gets a crowd of angry animal rights protesters yelling at you about Sealand or something.

[Puts on best GLaDOS impression] Inserts the operational end of the device.

Get's malicious intentions barely disguised as positive guidance.

Inserts clown shoes

Gets muffled squeaky noises.

Inserts a blue whale. (I"m curious, ok?)

Gets a blue whale in the face. 

Inserts an IPBM (Interplanetary Planetary Ballistic Missile)

Gets a distant, muffled, -boom- sound.

Inserts Mososaurus     ***My curiosity of seeing what happens when I shove sea animals in a vending machine has no bounds!***
